trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Massillon
There were no other sightings in Massillon on or around September 13th 2009
Summary: Flashing star like objects in northeastern sky and other experience.
divs: sighting detailsin response to id,us on 9\12\2009.. at approx 2:30 am sunday 9\13\09, i went out on my deck for a few minutes and looked to the northeastern-east sky. i seen 3 very bright flashing multicolored lights. there was also others as the same at a further distance. these objects were not clustered together. if these are spaceships, they are colorful little buggers! makes me think of christmas. : ) on other nites, i have seen them in the western sky also. i am a believer because of my passed experiences. one in summer of 1966 when i was outside walking a path to my aunts house next door to where i lived. i was 12 years old and seen the ship(disc) going down in our field about 200 ft away. i ran back to my house and sat on the couch facing the picture window. scared to death. within minutes, i seen a glowing ball(soccer ball size) pass from east to west across the window as if to say "we know you seen us"! in april 2007, it was a clear nite. i pulled into my driveway, got out of my car and a glowing ball (soccer ball size) appeared right in front of me about 10 feet out. it was there for 2 seconds and disappeared with a boom. (same as i seen in the year of 1966) my boyfriend was in my house and heard the boom also. then 3 weeks later 5\11\07, i and another person had a small ship fly very slowly approx. 50 feet above our heads at the establishment where we work. note !!... at around that time period, i was wishing that i would see a ufo again before i die.(wishes do come true) i thought this because my nephew who was in the navy observed and reported a red light over the smoke stacks at puget sound in wa state march 2007. (my nephew was contacted by peter davenport of nuforc and it was listed as a creditable sighting on the main page of that website.) as far as this 5\11\07 incident goes, my navy nephew commented that the government would not have aircraft flying over massillon ohio. maybe our government is capable of making such airships.. but i can't believe a glowing ball suspended in mid air or floating and just disappearing in front of your face! someday, the truth will be known to all. we are being watch over .. ...we need to be! i am on the ufo sites everyday. thanks to all who do report their truthful sightings. god bless. live long and prosper!
